{{Obsolete}} {{flavour|The card depicts a heavily-armoured knight riding across a barren landscape, bearing a red pennant.}} The Helm card casts random protective enchantments on the player. *Power level 0: Either [[Phase Shift]] or [[Stoneskin]]. *Power level 1: Phase Shift or Stoneskin, with a 50% chance of both, plus 50% chance of a magical shield that increases SH. *Power level 2: Phase Shift or Stoneskin, with a 75% chance of both, plus 75% chance of a magical shield and 100% chance of [[Potion of resistance|elemental resistance]]. ==History== The Helm card could be found in the following [[Decks|decks]] over the past several versions. {| class="prettytable" ![[0.11]] ![[0.12]] ![[0.13]] ![[0.14]] ![[0.15]] ![[0.16]] ![[0.17]] |---- !style="text-align:left;vertical-align:top;font-weight:normal"| [[Deck of changes|Changes]]
